name: OMSI Vehicle Configuration File
summary: Learn about .OVH files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The OVH file is made up of lines of data following a keyword (whether it's for a script or description). The format looks like this:
OMSI will only read lines of data that are in this format.

description: File created by OMSI The Bus Simulator, an omnibus driving simulation program; similar to other OMSI configuration files like .HUM, .SLI, .SCO, and .BUS files; holds configuration data for vehicles, such as their appearance, that interact on the road with the bus during gameplay; can be customized.
